{{cpp/title|tuple_element&lt;small&gt;&lt;std::experimental::ranges::tagged&gt;&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=ranges| 
template&lt; std::size_t N, class Base, class... Tags &gt;
struct tuple_element&lt;N, std::experimental::ranges::tagged&lt;Base, Tags...&gt;&gt;
    : std::tuple_element&lt;N, Base&gt; {};
}}

The partial specialization of {{c|std::tuple_element}} for {{tt|tagged}} provide compile-time access to the types of the {{tt|tagged}}'s elements, using tuple-like syntax. It simply forwards to {{c|std::tuple_element&lt;N, Base&gt;}}.
